deepseek-reasoner.notes: DeepSeek R1 - reasoning tokens billed as output tokens. Prompt caching available.

deepseek-chat.notes: DeepSeek Chat V3.1 with prompt caching support.

gemini-2.5-flash.notes: Google Gemini 2.5 Flash - stable release with native web search grounding.

gemini-2.5-pro.notes: Google Gemini 2.5 Pro with length-based pricing. Short: â‰¤200K tokens, Long: >200K tokens.

google/gemini-2.0-flash-001.notes: Google Gemini 2.0 Flash via OpenRouter - faster TTFT, enhanced coding capabilities, multimodal support.

openai/gpt-5.notes: OpenAI GPT-5 via OpenRouter - available for manual model override.

pricing_models_explained.flat_rate: Simple input/output pricing - multiply tokens by input_cost/output_cost
pricing_models_explained.cache_tiered: DeepSeek models - use cache_hit/cache_miss costs based on cached_tokens from API response
pricing_models_explained.length_tiered: Gemini Pro - use short/long costs based on prompt_length_threshold (200K tokens)
